entry.title: Are You Scared ?
entry.summary:
Author: Jesuslover123

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,603Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 175

Summary: Jonathan Crane is an introverted enigma. Not prone to conversing with anyone or bothering to meet them, but he finds himself becoming acquainted with quite an enchanting figure. He plans to use her to the fullest extent but that quickly foils as something changes within him. He somehow falls in love. What will he do about these foreign feelings and the warmth that consumes him? Will he destroy it all? Or indulge in it? Who knows? Not me.

entry.summary:
Author: TheLostOne526

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 49,569Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Lucas Allen is a teenage boy with a rare mental illness called DID. After the death of his father, he's forced to move in with his aunt and her family. That includes his cousin Gar. While he is living with them he falls into the hands of Doctor Niles Caulder after both he and his cousin get infected with a deadly sickness. After they both were cured by the doctor they were forced to live with him. While Gar can turn into different animals, Lucas gets affected by the doctor's mystery "Cure" in a different way. While he struggles with the changes to his body he also has to constantly battle to stay in control. Everything changes one day when Gar brings home Rachel Roth and the pair decide that leaving everything behind for a random girl they both just met is better than living in a mansion. Watch Lucas's shit show of life while he deals with his powers, his mental health, his newfound family, and even a romance that no one saw coming.

entry.title: So smile!
entry.summary:
Author: crying_outlad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,335Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 15

Summary: You'd always heard the phrase "be careful what you wish for", but you had never paid it any mind. And though growing up you had wished, prayed even, for your family's attention, the yearning had slowed down considerably, enough for you to choose to move out from the hell that had become your life.But just before you can leave the old, creaky manor, your wishes finally come true. And it's only after that you learn to appreciate what you had, awful as it was. But maybe, just maybe, you can escape your suffocating family.------------------Yandere! Batfam x Neglected Male! Reader.My Tumblr is the basically same as my AO3 @ lol.@crying-outlad if you're interested. This is the only post there so far anyway.
